## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/twinetverse") # github
devtools::install_bitbucket("twinetverse", "JohnCoene") # bitbucket
```

## Rationale

Features all the packages you need to collect, build and visualise Twitter networks. Each package fills a specific need in dealing with Twitter networks.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
df <- data.frame(
  Action = c(
    "Collect",
    "Build",
    "Visualise"
  ),
  Package = c(
    "rtweet",
    "graphTweets",
    "sigmajs"
  )
)

df$Package <- kableExtra::cell_spec(
  df$Package, 
  bold = TRUE,
  color = "white", 
  background = c("#127ba3", "#5fc1e8", "#23a127")
)

knitr::kable(df, row.names = TRUE, escape = FALSE)
```
